data.persona: I live with my family in the kingdom.  We follow the rules of the king, but we don't agree with all of them.  I despise him and wish to move away when we can.
data.description:
You are in the staircase.
The staircase is spiral and made of stone. The stone is smooth and cold from years of friction. The staircase reaches multiple levels of the tower and is the only way up or down.
There's a stone here.
The tavern owner is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothes.

data.short_motivation: I am going to hug the tavern owner at the bottom of the staircase because he is helping us with our plan and I want to say goodbye.
data.mid_motivation: I have charted a path out of the kingdom from the top of the tower through a thick patch of forest.
data.long_motivation: Me and my family have reached a new land and are happy to be in our new kingdom.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go to the top of the tower.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go through the trees towards a new kingdom
